ROW.Title: The guardian of the monastery reports the removal of four novices and their teacher from the island
ROW.Fondo: Procuratori di San Marco, De Supra
ROW.Title_Filza: Padri di San Francesco. Santo Spirito
ROW.Synopsis: Domenico Porta executed the Procuratori di Supra's order of removing the teacher and his four novices from the island.
